title: Rajarshri Chhatrapati Shahu Maharaj Merit Scholarship, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category
be studying in Class 11 and 12
have secured 75% and above marks in Class 10

title: IET India Scholarship Award 2024
eligi: Open for students studying in the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, or 4th year of a full-time regular undergraduate engineering program (in any field) approved by AICTE/UGC.
Applicants must have cleared all regular credit courses in a single attempt.
Applicants must have scored at least 60% in aggregate or an equivalent CGPA of at least six on a 10-point scale in the semesters cleared so far.
There is no age limit for the applicants.

title: The Cadence Scholarship Program 2024-25
eligi: Open for candidates residing and studying in Delhi NCR, Bangalore, Pune, or Ahmedabad (Indian nationals only).

For Undergraduate courses: Applicants must have successfully passed Class 12 with a minimum overall score of 60%. (NOTE: Candidates who are currently studying in Class 12 can also apply based on their previous record.)
For Postgraduate courses: Applicants must have completed graduation or be in the final year of their graduation program.
Applicants must reside and study in Delhi NCR, Bangalore, Pune, or Ahmedabad only.
Applicants must come from a lower-income group.

title: Eklavya Scholarship, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a graduate domiciled in Maharashtra
have secured a minimum of  60% marks in the Law, Commerce, and Arts streams and 70% marks in the Science stream from a recognised institution/university of Maharashtra
have an annual family income of less than or equal to ₹75,000
not be working anywhere as a part-time or full-time employee

title: MoSPI Postgraduate/Research Students Internship 2024-25
eligi: be a citizen of India
be pursuing a postgraduation/research degree from a recognised college, university or institute
be studying in specific fields such as Statistics, Mathematical Statistics, Operational Research, Economics, Demography or any of the applied fields of statistics

title: Post-Matric Tuition Fee and Examination Fee (Freeship), Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
belong to Scheduled Caste (SC) or Neo-Buddhist community
be studying in Class 11 and above in a government-recognised institution of the state
have passed SSC or equivalent matric
have annual income less than or equal to ₹ 2,50,000 from all sources

title: Maintenance Allowance for SC Students in Professional Courses, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category
be enrolled in a professional course in a recognised institution
be residing in a hostel (either a government, institute or outside campus)
have annual income less than or equal to ₹ 2,50,000 from all sources

title: Post-Matric Scholarship for Persons with Disability, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
have a disability of 40% or more certified by a competent authority
be studying in Class 11 to Ph. D. level in a government/government-aided institution in Maharashtra
have taken admission through the CAP process

title: Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme Government of India, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: belong to Scheduled Tribe (ST) Category of Maharashtra
have passed Class 10
have an annual family income of not more than ₹2,50,000
not have a gap of more than 2 years in their formal education

title: Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme Government of India, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: belong to Scheduled Tribe (ST) Category of Maharashtra
have passed Class 10
have an annual family income of not more than ₹2,50,000
not have a gap of more than 2 years in their formal education

title: Vocational Education Maintenance Allowance to ST Students, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: belong to Scheduled Tribe (ST) community of Maharashtra
be enrolled in a vocational course at a recognised institution
have an annual family income of less than or equal to ₹2,50,000
have passed the previous year's examination

title: Vocational Education Fee Reimbursement 2023-24, Maharashtra
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
belong to Scheduled Tribe (ST) category
be enrolled in one of the following vocational courses: Engineering, Pharmacy, Animal Husbandry, Vaastu Shastra, Dairy Development, MBA or MCA
have an annual family income of no more than ₹2,50,000 from all sources

title: Rajarshi Chhatrapati Shahu Maharaj Shikshan Shulk Shishyavrutti Yojna, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
be pursuing a professional or non-professional course approved by the Director of Higher Education (DHE) at a government or government-aided university/college
have taken admission under the General or Socially and Economically Backward Classes (SEBC) category
have an annual family income of up to ₹ 8,00,000

title: Assistance to Meritorious Students Scholarship - Junior Level, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
be a Class 11 and 12 student
have achieved top ranks in the secondary and higher secondary examination
hold a DHE-sanctioned letter

title: State Government Open Merit Scholarship, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
have passed Class 12
have secured a minimum of 60% marks
be pursuing graduation in Arts/Commerce/Science, or Law

title: Scholarship to Meritorious Students Possessing Mathematics/Physics, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be domicile of Maharashtra
have secured at least 60% marks in Class 12 in Science exam or more than 60% in Maths & Physics
be pursuing graduation degree in Science
have Maths and Physics as main subjects

title: D. K. Bhave Scholarship 2024
eligi: be a graduate of the Engineering Faculty of Savitribai Phule Pune University, or be a final year student pursuing a B.E. or B.Tech degree (in any branch) at an NBA-accredited institute within the PMC or PCMC area
have secured a confirmed admission based on merit for a master's degree in Engineering and Technology at an accredited university in the USA, Canada, Germany, or England
maintain a minimum academic record of a B grade or higher

title: Cyprus Institute of Neurology and Genetics (CING) Scholarship 2024
eligi: be an Indian national
hold a bachelor's degree from a recognised institution in a related field

Have applied for one of the following master's degree programs at the Cyprus Institute of Neurology & Genetics: M.Sc. in Molecular Medicine, M.Sc. in Medical Genetics, M.Sc. in Neuroscience, M.Sc. in Biotechnology. All programs are accredited by the Republic of Cyprus, European Union countries, and other countries
possess English language certification or any other internationally recognised standard if their previous degree was not taught in English

title: Global Scholarship Program AIS 2024
eligi: be a citizen of India or any country/region
have completed secondary school/high school education
have applied for an undergraduate/postgraduate course in any subject from an accredited college/institution/university in the world
have completed at least one term in the respective course
not be a college dropout

title: 'LIFE’S GOOD' Scholarship Program 2024 (Phase 1)
eligi: Students must be pursuing undergraduate/postgraduate courses (any academic year) from select colleges/institutes across India.

First-year students must have scored a minimum of 60% marks in their class 12th examinations, while students in the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th years must have achieved a minimum of 60% marks in the previous academic year.
Children of employees of Buddy4Study and LG Electronics India Private Limited are not eligible to participate in the scholarship.

title: India Fellow Social Leadership Program 2024-25
eligi: be an Indian citizen
be between the age of 20 to 30 years
hold a graduate degree in any discipline or be on track to complete graduation by the fellowship start date
be willing to be placed in any region and assigned to any thematic area within the program
demonstrate a willingness to commit to the 18-month full-time fellowship program

title: Bhumi Fellowship Program in India 2024-26
eligi: are aged between 20-30 years
hold a degree in Social Work, Sociology, English Literature, B.Ed., Psychology, Law, B.E., or B.Tech program
are aligned with Teaching, EdTech, or Systemic Transformation
have prior experience in event organising, club leading, team managing, or student union involvement
are willing to commit to a two-year full-time fellowship
are based in Chennai or are ready to move to Chennai
